item.title: History shows Nvidia's conference next week could be a catalyst to turn the stock around
item.description: Nvidia typically outperforms peers in the week of and period directly following the GTC.

item.title: These quality stocks on sale are set to beat the market, says Bernstein
item.description: Bernstein pointed out in a Monday note that quality stocks typically rebound 2% to 3% in the three months after a market sell-off.
